00021 // the constructor
00022 Parameter::Parameter(QDomNode &parameterNode): name_(QString()),
00023 value_(QString()), valueAttributes_(), description_() {
00024 
00025         for (int i = 0; i < parameterNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00026                 QDomNode tempNode = parameterNode.childNodes().at(i);
00027 
00028                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:name")) {
00029                         name_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00030                 }
00031                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:value")) {
00032                         value_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00033 
00034                         // parse all the attributes
00035                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, valueAttributes_);
00036                 }
00037                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:description")) {
00038                         description_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00039                 }
00040         }
00041         // if name or value was not found then document is invalid
00042         if (name_.isNull() ) {
00043                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name missing in "
00044                                 "spirit:parameter"));
00045         }
00046 
00047         if (value_.isNull()) {
00048                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element value missing in"
00049                                 " spirit:parameter"));
00050         }
00051         return;
00052 }

00055 }

00058 name_(other.name_),
00059 value_(other.value_),
00060 valueAttributes_(other.valueAttributes_),
00061 description_(other.description_) {
00062 }

00064 Parameter & Parameter::operator=( const Parameter &other ) {
00065         if (this != &other) {
00066                 name_ = other.name_;
00067                 value_ = other.value_;
00068                 valueAttributes_ = other.valueAttributes_;
00069                 description_ = other.description_;
00070         }
00071         return *this;
00072 }

00078 void Parameter::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00079         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:parameter");
00080 
00081         // if the mandatory name is not specified
00082         if (name_.isEmpty()) {
00083                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory name missing in "
00084                                 "spirit:parameter"));
00085         }
00086         else {
00087                 // write the name of the attribute
00088                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:name", name_);
00089         }
00090 
00091         // write the description if it exists
00092         if (!description_.isEmpty()) {
00093                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:description", description_);
00094         }
00095 
00096         // if the mandatory value is not specified
00097         if (value_.isEmpty()) {
00098                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory value missing in spirit:"
00099                                 "parameter"));
00100         }
00101         else {
00102                 // start the spirit:value tag
00103                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:value");
00104 
00105                 // write the attributes for the element
00106                 General::writeAttributes(writer, valueAttributes_);
00107 
00108                 // write the value of the element and close the tag
00109                 writer.writeCharacters(value_);
00110                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:value
00111         }
00112 
00113         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:parameter
00114         return;
00115 }
00116 
00117 void Parameter::setValueAttributes(const QMap<QString, QString> &attributes) {
00118         // first delete old attributes
00119         valueAttributes_.clear();
00120 
00121         // save new attributes
00122         valueAttributes_ = attributes;
00123 }

00153 bool Parameter::isValid() const {
00154 
00155         if (name_.isEmpty())
00156                 return false;
00157 
00158         else if (value_.isEmpty())
00159                 return false;
00160 
00161         return true;
00162 }
